about_the_game:
A quirky witch’s house tileset for RPG Maker! Is the witch who lives inside good or evil?

The Witch’s House Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water and grass tiles
Wood panels
Stone paths
Fences and tables

Walls:

Two tones of tan walls (one with brick, one without), with purple roofs! Includes shadow-side roof tile. Other dark stone tiles included as well!

Also includes:

Windows, beaded curtains, and plenty of furniture to give your witch plenty of interior decor.
Hanging/dried herbs
Jeweled ornaments, crystals and crystal balls
Growing plants (in ground and pots)
Cobwebs
Candles, books and other random decor items
Lots of potion bottles, by themselves and also on shelves
Spell-making accessories
Cauldron, with and without glowing potion inside
Wide variety of gnarled trees
Lots of house-building tiles for unique exterior layouts

and more!


Events and Animations:

Doors
Two treasure chests, one with glowing object inside, one without

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
